Front Axle, Non-Driving 02

ARVINMERITOR ON-TRAC PRE-APPROVAL, Allowance

Includes:
1. Obtain Pre-Approval

Notes:
1. Pre-Approval # must be recorded on claim - Only one use per occurance

Component Qualifier Code Applies To Hours
V02-9000 All Models 0.2

FRONT HUB BEARINGS/RACES (WHEEL BEARING), Replace

Includes:
1. Remove and replace component and reinstall all related parts
2. R&R wheels when required and torque to spec
3. R&R hub cap & gasket, hub & drum or caliper
4. Clean, inspect hub, repack or lube bearing(s); Adjust bearings. Adjust brakes (drum brakes only)

Component Qualifier Code Applies To Hours
Drum Brake One Wheel A02-310 All Models 1.0
Drum Brake Both Wheels A02-311 All Models 1.6
Caliper Disc Brake One Wheel A02-312 All Models 1.1
Caliper Disc Brake Both Wheels A02-313 All Models 1.9

FRONT HUB GREASE/OIL SEAL (WHEEL SEAL), Replace

Includes:
1. Remove and replace component and reinstall all related parts
2. R&R wheels when required and torque to spec
3. R&R hub & drum or caliper, or hub & rotor assembly
4. Clean, inspect hub, repack or lube bearing(s); Adjust bearings. Adjust brakes (drum brakes only)

Component Qualifier Code Applies To Hours
Drum Brake One Wheel A02-320 All Models 0.9
Drum Brake Both Wheels A02-321 All Models 1.4
Caliper Disc Brake One Wheel A02-322 All Models 1.1
Caliper Disc Brake Both Wheels A02-323 All Models 1.7

Addon If Required   Code Applies To Hours
TO REPLACE BRAKE SHOES/LININGS AND CLEAN BACKING PLATE. USE THIS ADD-ON WHEN WHEEL BEARING SEAL LEAK REPAIR IS PERFORMED ONLY.,        
Each Wheel A02-320-1 All Models 0.5

FRONT I-BEAM AXLE, Replace

Includes:
1. Remove and replace component and reinstall all related parts
2. Clean, inspect wheel bearings, adjust steering stops, toe-in, and front brakes
3. R&R steering knuckle bushings and o-ring seals
4. Replace wheel seals
5. R&R and/or replace hub cap/gasket

Component Qualifier Code Applies To Hours
A02-260 All Models 6.2

FRONT WHEEL HUB BEARINGS, Adjust

Includes:
1. R&R and/or replace hub cap/gasket

Notes:
1. Not to be used with Replace Wheel Bearings/Races or Wheel Seal

Component Qualifier Code Applies To Hours
One Wheel A02-330 All Models 0.5
Both Wheels A02-331 All Models 0.8

FRONT WHEEL HUB CAP AND/OR GASKET, Replace

Includes:
1. Remove and replace component and reinstall all related parts

Notes:
1. Not to be used with Replace Wheel Bearings/Races or Wheel Seal

Component Qualifier Code Applies To Hours
Each Wheel A02-340 All Models 0.3

STEERING ARM, Replace

Includes:
1. Remove and replace component and reinstall all related parts
2. R&R brake chamber camshaft and support bracket as required
3. Adjust toe-in and steering stops

Component Qualifier Code Applies To Hours
All Axles Left Upper Arm A02-290 All Models 1.4
All Axles Left Lower Arm A02-291 All Models 1.0
All Axles Right Lower Arm A02-292 All Models 1.0

STEERING KNUCKLE (KING PIN) O-RING SEAL, Replace

Includes:
1. Remove and replace component and reinstall all related parts

Component Qualifier Code Applies To Hours
All Axles One side or both A02-280 All Models 0.3

STEERING KNUCKLE PINS AND BUSHINGS (KING PIN), Replace

Includes:
1. Remove and replace component and reinstall all related parts
2. Ream bushings to fit pins, adjust wheel bearings, toe-in, steering stops, and front brakes
3. Replace knuckle o-ring seal(s)
4. R&R and/or replace hub cap/gasket

Component Qualifier Code Applies To Hours
All Axles One Side A02-270 All Models 3.1
All Axles Both Sides A02-271 All Models 5.5

TIE ROD END(S), Replace

Includes:
1. Remove and replace component and reinstall all related parts
2. Adjust toe-in

Component Qualifier Code Applies To Hours
All Front Axles One End A02-300 All Models 0.9
All Front Axles Both Ends A02-301 All Models 1.1

WARRANTY OPERATIONS NOT COVERED IN THIS SECTION, T-Time

Notes:
1. This is not to be used to code diagnosis, testing or cleaning of operations already covered in this section. The time for those items is included in the operation. A written description or explanation must accompany each

Component Qualifier Code Applies To Hours
T-TIME A02-T1 All Models 0.0
T-TIME A02-T2 All Models 0.0
T-TIME A02-T3 All Models 0.0
